SEARCH
Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core

Class ViewOrders

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.core.ViewOrders
public class ViewOrders extends Object
All constants that are related to the view order of any Node that is to be part of a YaegerGame.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final double
    VIEW_ORDER_COORDINATE_GRID
    The default value for the viewOrder for the Coordinate grid that is shown when the commandline option --showGrid is being used.
    static final int
    VIEW_ORDER_DEBUGGER
    Since the debugger should be visible in all cases, it should have an exceptionally low view order.
    static final double
    VIEW_ORDER_ENTITY_DEFAULT
    The default value for the viewOrder for instances of YaegerEntity.
    static final double
    VIEW_ORDER_ENTITY_DEFAULT_BEHIND
    The default value for the viewOrder for instances of YaegerEntity that are part of a TileMap.
    static final double
    VIEW_ORDER_ENTITY_STICKY
    The default value for the viewOrder for instances of YaegerEntity.
    static final int
    VIEW_ORDER_SCROLLPANE
    In case of a ScrollableDynamicScene, the ScrollPane should be placed behind the Pane that is to be used for sticky instances of Node.
    static final int
    VIEW_ORDER_STICKYPANE
    In case of a ScrollableDynamicScene, the ScrollPane should be placed behind the Pane that is to be used for sticky instances of Node.

    • VIEW_ORDER_ENTITY_DEFAULT_BEHIND

      public static final double VIEW_ORDER_ENTITY_DEFAULT_BEHIND
      The default value for the viewOrder for instances of YaegerEntity that are part of a TileMap. These will, by default be behind the YaegerEntity that are not part of a TileMap.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values
